item.title: Home 12
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Healthy Pet
Happy Owner

Holistic nutrition for cats & dogs Our Philosophy

Real pet food, fresh
from the fridge

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. For Dogs For Cats

Health protection

Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Purposefully formulated

Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Help your pet stay
healthy & happy

  • Proactively invest in your pet’s health with a vet-approved nutritious diet
  • Through the power of food, we've helped relieve pets' ailments, improve pets' mood and vitality.
  • Our thousands of success stories show how effective a change of diet can be.
  • Switching to a healthier, natural diet helps maintain a healthy body weight and combat obesity.
  • We stand for fresh, healthy food for long, healthy lives.
  • Air drying acts as a natural form of preservation; this means we don’t add any preservatives
  • Gone are the days of mysterious brown biscuits full of additives.
  • Our food is made in the UK, is full of the same ingredients you'd find in your own food

Pure common
sense

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Get Started

No hidden nasties

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. More About Our ingredients

Up to 70% meat
and animal ingredients

LambA great option for pets that are sensitive to other animal proteins. SalmonSalmon contains protein and fatty acids that help your pet maintain strong muscles and a shiny coat. Sweet PotatoesA highly digestible energy source that has a sweet taste pets love. Bison and BuffaloLow in calories and fat, bison and buffalo are great options for pets on a diet. Green PeasRich in carbs and protein, green peas are an excellent alternative to grains. Bison and BuffaloLow in calories and fat, bison and buffalo are great options for pets on a diet.

Thousands of happy
letters

“Nelly, my labrador loved it immediatly! During the transition she first picked the Grandorf kibbles out of her bowl, so the taste is optimal. Besides that she scratches herself way less than before.” Tracey L., New York “Nelly, my labrador loved it immediatly! During the transition she first picked the Grandorf kibbles out of her bowl, so the taste is optimal. Besides that she scratches herself way less than before.” Tracey L., New York “Our Mimske adores the Grandorf kibbles. The kibbles are pretty small and since I give them she vomits way less than before and she runs immediately to the kibbles, which she didn’t do before!” John Doe., New York “Our Mimske adores the Grandorf kibbles. The kibbles are pretty small and since I give them she vomits way less than before and she runs immediately to the kibbles, which she didn’t do before!” John Doe., New York
